document_data.name: ''Shield of Fortitude''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shields of fortitude''''' were huge [[enchanted]] [[shield]]s of dull gray [[steel]], forged and ensorcelled by the [[duergar]] [[dwarves]] underneath the [[Spine of the World]].
document_data.Powers: Those who held such shields felt pulsating rejuvenation magic that ran through the item and into the wielder. This steeling magic aided them in battle, as did the shield's size and sturdiness.
document_data.History: In {{YearlinkName|1312}}, one such steel shield belonged to [[Barud Barzam]], a duergar leader who was in charge of an underground outpost in the [[River Caves]], where the [[Black Raven River]] spills from under the [[Spine of the World]]. Barud offered his ''shield of fortitude'' to anyone willing to descend into the lower caverns underneath the outpost to exterminate [[hook horror]]s and [[mustard jellies]] who infested the area.
